guide.introduction: This project will show you how to mount small (1/300 scale) aircraft to the Omni-Stand mounts. Once the mounts are properly attached then it will work with all the Omni-Stand products.
guide.introduction_rendered:
This project will show you how to mount small (1/300 scale) aircraft to the Omni-Stand mounts. Once the mounts are properly attached then it will work with all the Omni-Stand products.

Relevant parts
  • Omni-Stand Peg
  • 1/300 Scale Scotia P51D Mustang
Tools
  • Epoxy kit
  • Exacto Knife

lines.text: This tutorial will show you how to attach an Omni-Stand mounting peg to a Scotia 1/300-scale P-51D Mustang. The Scotia models are available here.
lines.text_raw: This tutorial will show you how to attach an Omni-Stand mounting peg to a Scotia 1/300-scale P-51D Mustang. The Scotia models are available [http://www.i-94enterprises.com/scotia_1_300.htm|here.]

lines.text: This model is too small to drill a hole in. We are going to attach the mount flush to the model.
lines.text_raw: This model is too small to drill a hole in. We are going to attach the mount flush to the model.

lines.text: The first step is to prep the mounting peg. Score the top several times to give it a rough surface for the epoxy to stick to. You can score the miniature, too, as long as you're careful not to score too large an area.
lines.text_raw: The first step is to prep the mounting peg. Score the top several times to give it a rough surface for the epoxy to stick to. You can score the miniature, too, as long as you're careful not to score too large an area.

lines.text: Now to mix the epoxy. We use mixing syringes filled with some Devcon 30-minute epoxy. We recommend epoxy for this because most other options like CA glue are too brittle and not strong enough to give you a permanent hold.
lines.text_raw: Now to mix the epoxy. We use mixing syringes filled with some Devcon 30-minute epoxy. We recommend epoxy for this because most other options like CA glue are too brittle and not strong enough to give you a permanent hold.

lines.text: Now we attach the mount close to the center of the plane.
lines.text_raw: Now we attach the mount close to the center of the plane.

lines.text: Now we wait for the epoxy to cure. Once that is done the plane is ready for use with the Omni-Stand system. This plane works great with the sphere magnet mounts.
lines.text_raw: Now we wait for the epoxy to cure. Once that is done the plane is ready for use with the Omni-Stand system. This plane works great with the [http://www.corseceng.com/omni-stand/sphere-magnet-add-on/|sphere magnet mounts].

guide.summary: A quick and easy way to mount smaller planes and spaceships to the Omni-Stand system from CorSec Engineering.
